JobTitle: Learning & Development Program Manager – Product Security
JobFullDesc: Learning & Development Program Manager – Product SecurityLocation:  Remote – United StatesThe security of customers’ data and systems is of paramount importance to Dell Technologies.  Our Product and Application Security team designs and develops software and systems to minimize security risks within our products. As experts working at the forefront of security, we undertake vulnerability response handling, implement the secure development lifecycle, coordinate security certifications, and develop common software security components and toolkits. As well as ensuring the authenticity and integrity of the product code during product development, we mitigate risks of sourcing and delivery of counterfeit or maliciously tainted components in our products.  Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Learning & Development Program Manager on our Product & Application Security team in the United States.What you’ll achieveAs a Program Manager, you will help develop, maintain and coordinate the overall security training curriculum, coordinate instructor-led training, oversee learning tools and coordinate training within our Product & Application Security (PAS) team.  You will educate internal customers, such as engineering and our security champions, about Dell’s security best practices as well as support the Security Champion Program at Dell.  This will include supporting engineers who are members and represent the “voice” of security for a given product or application.  You will:Assist business partners in addressing their specific training and/or job role training requirements by identifying and sharing appropriate materialsDevelop, maintain and deliver security training in interactive Computer Based Training/Web Based Training (CBT/WBT) formats using internal and external resources, both directly (using content authoring tools including Articulate Storyline 360) and by managing vendorsDevelop high quality research-based resources, events, and trainings on timely mission-aligned to address the needs of our security championsPartner closely with Secure Development Lifecycle team on meeting the security champion training requirementsProvide support to the Security Champion Program Lead on program initiativesOversee the security champion program user experience so our security champions have the best end to end experienceTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
